attributes.action: Do not jail the Royal Marine!!
attributes.additional_details:
Do not jail this brave Royal Marine for doing what
hundreds of thousands of people would have done.
He has many years of loyal service to this Country, and the people that pass sentence have no idea what
we put our brave hero's through.  This man has in no
way damaged the name of the Royal Marines, who am are 100% behind him.  Don't name him, just set him free.  Shame we cannot give him a medal for his
work.  This man, in the eyes of most people, is not
guilty.  Wonder what the Taliban man would have done to him, if the positions were reversed.  If justice rules, then let 'our' soldier free!
